card.name: Jimmy, the Comfort Eater
card.text: Stamina Regen = 2 Hunger 3 (At the beginning of your end phase, put hunger counters on this permanent equal to the amount of its hunger not satiated this turn. Then if this permanent has three or more hunger counters, remove an endurance counter from it.) At the beginning of your first turn, satiate Jimmy, the Comfort Eater’s hunger by 3. Whenever Jimmy, the Comfort Eater’s hunger is satiated for the third time each turn, put an endurance counter on him.

card.name: Satiation Potion
card.text: Tap, Remove an endurance counter from Satiation Potion: Satiate target permanent’s hunger by 6.

card.name: Healing Potion
card.text: Tap, Remove an endurance counter from Healing Potion: If target permanent has less endurance counters on it than its starting endurance, put endurance counters on it equal to the difference.

card.name: Rat Swarm
card.text: On Trigger: Each opponent spoils 3. You may spoil 3. If you do, each opponent spoils an additional 3. (They remove 3 counters from among Foods they control.) Reuse {4} (You may play this card from your discard pile for its reuse cost. Void it when it would next enter a private zone or your discard pile.)

card.name: Hurricane
card.text: On Trigger: Remove 3 endurance counters from target structure.

card.name: Earthquake
card.text: On Trigger: Remove 6 endurance counters from each Structure in play.

card.name: Questionably Science
card.text: Draw two cards.

card.name: Rat Horde
card.text: On Trigger: Each opponent spoils 4. You may spoil 4. If you do, each opponent spoils an additional 4. (They remove 4 counters from among Foods they control.) Reuse {5} (You may play this card from your discard pile for its reuse cost. Void it when it would next enter a private zone or your discard pile.)

card.name: Worker
card.text: Stamina Regen = 1 Hunger 1 (At the beginning of your end phase, put hunger counters on this permanent equal to the amount of its hunger not satiated this turn. Then if this permanent has three or more hunger counters, remove an endurance counter from it.)

card.name: Restoration
card.text: If target non-survivor permanent has less endurance counters than its starting endurance, put endurance counters on it equal to the difference.

card.name: Starving Worker
card.text: Stamina Regen = 1 At the beginning of your end phase, if you have no stamina, remove an endurance counter from Starving Worker.

card.name: Skilled Worker
card.text: Stamina Regen = 2 Hunger 2 (At the beginning of your end phase, put hunger counters on this permanent equal to the amount of its hunger not satiated this turn. Then if this permanent has three or more hunger counters, remove an endurance counter from it.)

card.name: Tower of Knowledge
card.text: At the beginning of your main phase, research.

card.name: Tower of Wealth
card.text: At the beginning of your main phase, draw a card.

card.name: Wildfire
card.text: On Trigger: Remove 1 endurance counter from each structure you don’t control.

card.name: Sabotage
card.text: Reactive Put target card on the stack into its owner’s discard pile.

card.name: Reanimation Ritual
card.text: On Trigger: Put target ally card in your graveyard onto the field under your control.

card.name: Distort
card.text: Reactive Put target card in an event queue into its owner’s discard pile.

card.name: Watchtower
card.text: If an endurance counter would be removed from an ally you control, if it wasn’t part of a cost, you may remove that endurance counter from Watchtower instead. If an ally you control would be destroyed, you may remove an endurance counter from Watchtower instead.

card.name: Wall
card.text: If an endurance counter would be removed from a permanent you control, if it wasn’t part of a cost, you may remove that endurance counter from Wall instead. If a permanent you control would be destroyed, you may remove an endurance counter from Wall instead.

card.name: Storehouse
card.text: If an endurance counter would be removed from a Food you control, if it wasn’t part of a cost, you may remove that endurance counter from Storehouse instead. If a Food you control would be destroyed, you may remove an endurance counter from Storehouse instead.

card.name: Farm Plot
card.text: Tap: Create a Food token.

card.name: Rats
card.text: On Trigger: Each opponent spoils 1. You may spoil 1. If you do, each opponent spoils an additional 1. (They remove 1 counters from among Foods they control.) Reuse {2} (You may play this card from your discard pile for its reuse cost. Void it when it would next enter a private zone or your discard pile.)

card.name: Giant
card.text: Stamina Regen = 3

card.text: Hunger 1 (At the beginning of your end phase, put hunger counters on this permanent equal to the amount of its hunger not satiated this turn. Then if this permanent has three or more hunger counters, remove an endurance counter from it.) Other Wolf allies you control enter with an additional endurance counter.

card.name: Wolf Tamer
card.text: Hunger 1 (At the beginning of your end phase, put hunger counters on this permanent equal to the amount of its hunger not satiated this turn. Then if this permanent has three or more hunger counters, remove an endurance counter from it.) Wolf allies you control’s hunger value is decreased by 1.

card.name: Minor Distortion
card.text: Put target card in an event queue into its owner’s discard pile.

card.name: Visionary
card.text: Hunger 1 (At the beginning of your end phase, put hunger counters on this permanent equal to the amount of its hunger not satiated this turn. Then if this permanent has three or more hunger counters, remove an endurance counter from it.) When Visionary enters play, research. Tap, Remove an endurance counter from Visionary: Create a Decay token in your event queue.

card.name: Woofbert, the Canine
card.text: Stamina Regen = 3 Hunger 3 (At the beginning of your end phase, put hunger counters on this permanent equal to the amount of its hunger not satiated this turn. Then if this permanent has three or more hunger counters, remove an endurance counter from it.) At the beginning of your first turn, satiate Woofbert, the Canine’s hunger by 3. Whenever a Wolf ally you control enters play, put an endurance counter on Woofbert, the Canine.

card.name: Mage Pupil
card.text: Hunger 1 (At the beginning of your end phase, put hunger counters on this permanent equal to the amount of its hunger not satiated this turn. Then if this permanent has three or more hunger counters, remove an endurance counter from it.) If you would put a card into your hand from researching, you may put that card into your discard pile instead. If you do, create a Decay token in your event queue.

card.name: Mage Healer
card.text: Hunger 1 (At the beginning of your end phase, put hunger counters on this permanent equal to the amount of its hunger not satiated this turn. Then if this permanent has three or more hunger counters, remove an endurance counter from it.) Whenever you research, put an endurance counter on target ally.

card.name: Giant Warrior
card.text: Stamina Regen = 1 Tap, Remove an endurance counter from Giant Warrior: Create a Decay token in your event queue.

card.name: Acolyte of Eziarag
card.text: Hunger 1 (At the beginning of your end phase, put hunger counters on this permanent equal to the amount of its hunger not satiated this turn. Then if this permanent has three or more hunger counters, remove an endurance counter from it.) When Acolyte of Eziarag dies, create an Eziarag Summons token.

card.name: Eziarag
card.text: When Eziarag enters play, if it didn’t enter from your sideboard, remove all endurance counters from it. Tap, Remove an endurance counter from Eziarag: Create three Decay tokens in your event queue.

card.name: Dagger of Eziarag
card.text: Tap, Remove an endurance counter from Dagger of Eziarag, Remove X endurance counters from an Ally you control: Create X Eziarag Summons tokens.

card.name: Pendant of Eziarag
card.text: Tap: Create an Eziarag Summons token.

card.name: Loaf of Bread
card.text: Tap, Remove 1 endurance counter from Loaf of Bread: Satiate target permanent’s hunger by 2.

card.name: Chicken Coop
card.text: {1}, Tap: Create a Food token. {2}, Tap, Destroy a Food item you control: Create three Food tokens.

card.name: Wild Rabbit
card.text: Hunger 1 (At the beginning of your end phase, put hunger counters on this permanent equal to the amount of its hunger not satiated this turn. Then if this permanent has three or more hunger counters, remove an endurance counter from it.) When Wild Rabbit dies, create two Food tokens.

card.name: Rat Infiltration
card.text: On Trigger: Each opponent spoils 3. Then they may pay {3}. If they don’t, put Rat Infiltration back into your event queue after it finishes triggering. (They remove 3 counters from among Foods they control.)

card.text: Stamina Regen = 3 Hunger 3 (At the beginning of your end phase, put hunger counters on this permanent equal to the amount of its hunger not satiated this turn. At the beginning of your first turn, satiate Lemek, Apocalypse Harbinger’s hunger by 3. {2}: Trigger an event in your event queue.

card.name: Dire Wolf
card.text: Hunger 1 (At the beginning of your end phase, put hunger counters on this permanent equal to the amount of its hunger not satiated this turn. Then if this permanent has three or more hunger counters, remove an endurance counter from it.) Tap, Remove an endurance counter from Dire Wolf: Create a Decay token in your event queue.

card.name: The Worldcake
card.text: The Worldcake costs {1} less to play for each Food you control. Tap, Remove an endurance counter from The Worldcake: Put an endurance counter on target survivor or ally.
